name: Cybernetic Rush
description:
Cybernetic Rush is a racing game where the player is a graffiti artist fugitive that is escaping the city's robotic authorities. Explore the crowded concrete jungle of Syndicate City from the skyline to the sewers as you traverse and platform your way away from enemies. 

Controls:
Mouse - Move Camera
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Left Shift - Use Boost Power-Up
Escape - Pause/In-Game Menu
